UI_visible_response: The adjustment of the composition of the State Council leadership team is a decision made by the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core based on the overall situation and development needs. It is to better promote the work of the country and meet the requirements of various undertakings in the new era.Each leadership adjustment is to promote the better development of the country's various undertakings and is an important measure to adapt to the overall situation of the country's development. We should view these adjustments from a rational and objective perspective and have full confidence in the development of the country.
traffic_visible_response: 正在搜索找到 12 篇资料参考The reasons for Qin Gang's dismissal involve multiple aspects, including work - related adjustments and other factors. Here is a detailed breakdown:- **Adjustment of diplomatic work arrangements**: On July 25, 2023, the Fourth Meeting of the Standing Committee of the Fourteenth National People's Congress decided to remove Qin Gang from his concurrent post as Minister of Foreign Affairs and appoint Wang Yi as Minister of Foreign Affairs. This personnel adjustment is mainly to better adapt to the development needs of China's diplomatic work, meet the requirements of the international situation and the country's diplomatic strategy, and give play to the respective advantages of different leaders in promoting the continuous progress of diplomatic undertakings.- **Resignation from representative position**: On February 27, 2024, the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress announced that the Tianjin Municipal People's Congress Standing Committee had decided to accept Qin Gang's resignation from his position as a deputy to the Fourteenth National People's Congress, and his representative qualification was terminated. The reasons for resigning as a deputy to the National People's Congress may include work adjustments, inability to perform duties due to physical reasons, and resignation due to violations of discipline and laws, dereliction of duty, etc.- **Removal from central committee member**: On July 18, 2024, the Third Plenary Session of the Twentieth Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was held in Beijing. The plenary session decided to accept Qin Gang's resignation application and remove him from his position as a member of the Central Committee.In general, the adjustment of Qin Gang's position is the result of the Party and the country's overall consideration of various factors, aiming to better promote the development of various undertakings.
